verses.name: Mark 6:4
verses.text: But Jesus said unto them, A prophet is not without honour, but in his own country, and among his own kin, and in his own house.

verses.name: Mark 6:5
verses.text: And he could there do no mighty work, save that he laid his hands upon a few sick folk, and healed them.

verses.name: Mark 6:6
verses.text: And he marvelled because of their unbelief. And he went round about the villages, teaching.

verses.name: Mark 6:7
verses.text: And he called unto him the twelve, and began to send them forth by two and two; and gave them power over unclean spirits;
